medical_history.chief_complaint: Pain in the left shoulder after tripping over a backpack strap.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient noted immediate severe pain around the left shoulder after tripping earlier in the day, without paresthesias or neck pain. Physical examination showed limited range of motion due to pain and bony point tenderness over the humeral head.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Multiple fractures of the femur, elbow, and wrist; pericarditis; erectile dysfunction; perforated tympanic membranes; hypertension; retinal tears with partial early detachments; myopia; kyphoscoliosis; Î²-thalassemia trait; esophageal reflux.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had hypothyroidism and fibromyalgia; father had melanoma and benign prostatic hypertrophy. No history of fractures in parents or brother.
medical_history.social_history: Smoked 10 cigarettes per day, did not use ethanol or illicit drugs. University graduate student.
